#summary First steps

= Introduction =

This page will give you, step by step, the information needed to start with our API


= Details =
 # Using our documentation and examples, you should try to call a basic API function : [getServerTime](). Doing so, you'll be able to check if everything is ok on your side. This function does not require any authentication.
 # To access the other functions of our API, you need an API key (contact our customer service to get one)
 # Once you have your API key, you can call [addItemAuction]() or [addItemFixedPrice]() to insert items on the website.
